verses.text: \w Then|strong="H7126"\w* \w came|strong="H7126"\w* \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Salphaad, \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hepher|strong="H2660"\w*, \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Galaad, \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w*, \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Manasses, \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H7126"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* Maala, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Noa, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Hegla, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Melcha, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Thersa.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w they|strong="H0559"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w princes|strong="H5387"\w* \w of|strong="H0168"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* people \w at|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w door|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H0168"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w of|strong="H0168"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* covenant, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Our|strong="H3068"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sedition, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w raised|strong="H8432"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w under|strong="H5921"\w* Core, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* \w sin|strong="H2399"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w male|strong="H1121"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*. \w Why|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* name \w taken|strong="H1961"\w* \w away|strong="H4057"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w family|strong="H0001"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*? \w Give|strong="H1961"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* possession \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* kinsmen \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H8034"\w* referred \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w cause|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* judgment \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord.
\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*:

\w The|strong="H0559"\w* daughters \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Salphaad demand \w a|strong="H3068"\w* just thing: Give \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* possession \w among|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* father’s kindred, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* let \w them|strong="H0413"\w* succeed \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* inheritance.
\w And|strong="H0001"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* children \w of|strong="H1323"\w* Israel thou shalt \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w these|strong="H1696"\w* things:

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* dieth \w without|strong="H0369"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w shall|strong="H0251"\w* succeed \w him|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0001"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w shall|strong="H0251"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* uncles \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w next|strong="H0413"\w* akin. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w this|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* sacred \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* perpetual law, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*: \w Go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \w Abarim|strong="H5682"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w view|strong="H7200"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* thence \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0251"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* thou shalt \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w it|strong="H7200"\w*, thou \w also|strong="H1571"\w* shalt \w go|strong="H0622"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* gone:

\w Because|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* offended \w me|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* Sin \w in|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* contradiction \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* multitude, neither \w would|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* \w me|strong="H0834"\w* \w before|strong="H5869"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w at|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*. \w These|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* contradiction \w in|strong="H5869"\w* Cades \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* Sin.
\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*:

\w May|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w spirits|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* provide \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w may|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* multitude:

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w lead|strong="H3318"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w*: lest \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w people|strong="H0834"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* Josue \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w*, \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w put|strong="H3947"\w* thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* multitude:

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* precepts \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sight \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w part|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w glory|strong="H1935"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w may|strong="H3478"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w If|strong="H1121"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w thing|strong="H1931"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w done|strong="H3605"\w*, \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w consult|strong="H7592"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*. \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rest \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* multitude \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w word|strong="H6310"\w*.

\w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* Josue, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w set|strong="H5975"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w assembly|strong="H5712"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H0834"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* laying \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* head, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w repeated|strong="H1696"\w* all \w things|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.
